item.title: Report E-2024050011
item.description:
Report E-2024050011

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-03T15:12:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-27
  • City: LITTLE ROCK
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 7000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: XPO-LOGISTICS contacted ERTS regarding a punctured 55-gallon metal drum containing SILQUEST TEOS PURE SILANE Tetraethoxysilane. The puncture came from a nail in a pallet and resulted in an estimated 5-gallon release onto the wooden trailer floor in a 5’x5’ area. A Contractor cleaned-up the release and overpacked the damaged drum. One drum of waste was generated for disposal. No storm-drains, waterways, or soil were impacted by this incident.
